content: Looking ahead, when combining our increased weighted average effective yield of our CLO equity portfolio, our favorable cash flow, and then the favorable default trends in the market, our reset and refinancing activity and the potential earnings to the portfolio we believe the Company remains very well-positioned to continue increasing net investment income in the coming quarters. The Company's third quarter GAAP net income was comprised of total investment income of $24.3 million net unrealized gains of $33.5 million and realized capital gains of $0.6 million, partially offset by Company expenses of $11.2 million.
